place.original: Wilton St George, Wilton, Somerset, England

citation.value: Joseph Houghton Spencer, transcriber, Church of England, Parish Church of Wilton (Somerset). A copy of the registers of the baptisms, marriages, and burials at the church of St. George in the parish of Wilton : adjoining Taunton, in the county of Somerset from A.D. 1558 to A.D. 1837; Marriage entry for Samuel Ham and Elizabeth Spiller (3 November 1828), (Taunton: Barnicott, 1890), p. 224, No. 86.

place.original: Wilton St George, Wilton, Somerset, England

document.text: Samuel Ham of the parish of Honiton and Elizabeth Spiller were married this 3rd day of November 1828 by David Smith Stone, Pl Curate, In the Presence of Jno Pain. R.G. Halls. Peggy Hammet. No. 86.
